Publications using Cactus

How to cite Cactus

Thank you for using Cactus. When you write a publication using data produced with the help of Cactus or Cactus, consider citing the following if appropriate:

Citebase collects statistics about citations of arXiv.org eprints. Its entry for the original Cactus paper lists other eprints which refer to it or are co-cited with it.

Please tell us if you have written a publication or a thesis using Cactus. This list of publications is also available as pdf or bibtex file.

Publications in refereed journals

Book Chapters
